text: Soni (kumbuchilani) katema kajwatawene Allah chilanga ni Achimitume (pakwatenda kuti): “Chisimu mulimose mwachinampele chitabu ni lunda lwakusokoka (nikuwa ni umanyilisi kwisa soni uchimbichimbi wakupunda), kaneko ni kwisa kum’bichilila Ntenga jwakwitichisya yan'di nayo, ichiwajilwa kukwenu kunkulupilila ni kunkamuchisya.” (Jwalakwe) jwaawusisye kuti: “Ana nkundile ni kujigala pa yalakweyi chilanga Changuchi?” Wanganyao watite: “Tukundile.” (Jwalakwe) jwatite: “Basi tendelani umboni (yachilangachi), nombe Une ndinamwe pakutendela umboni.”
